subject: PHYS
title: Perimeter Scholars International Explorations in Quantum Gravity
description: This course will introduce the students to the basic techniques and results of the field of loop quantum gravity.  Possible topics include: 1) The Ashtekar variables and the Hamiltonian formalism; 2) The Plebanski action for general relativity; 3) The Hilbert space of loop quantum gravity and basic operators such as the area and volume operators; 4) Spin foam models; 5) Group field theory; 6) Quantum black hole horizons.
